snippet.title: Grifford Academy - Official Combat Overview Trailer | Re-MIX Showcase July 2023
snippet.description:
Join a member of the development team at LandShark for a deep dive into the combat of Grifford Academy, an upcoming turn-based RPG. In Grifford Academy, join Erika and friends in an empowering coming-of-age turn-based RPG as they journey into a mystical book realm. Equip unique items and tailor your party’s abilities to battle vicious monsters. Test the strength of friendship, teamwork and personal growth as the secrets of the book unfold.


Grifford Academy will be available on PC.
